articles.one_line: Gucci criticised for 'AI slop' images ahead of major fashion show

articles.title: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts
articles.summary: Wayve says it's confident all cars will one day be autonomous, as it announced more than a £1bn in additional investment.
articles.one_line: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts

articles.title: New Zealand dump hosts Sri Lanka out of T20 World Cup
articles.summary: New Zealand beat Sri Lanka by 61 runs to knock the co-hosts out of the T20 World Cup and boost their own semi-final hopes.
articles.one_line: New Zealand dump hosts Sri Lanka out of T20 World Cup
